title: Right to rectification according to Art 16 GDPR
request:
Dear {{Addressee}}!
 
I hereby claim my right to rectification. 
 
The following personal data is incorrect: 
 
 
 
 
The following personal data is incomplete:
 
 
 
 
I request the following personal date to be added:
 
 
 
I request the incorrect personal data to be changed to:
 
 
 
I also provide this supplementary statement:
 
 
 
 
Additionally, I request that, in accordance with Art 18 (1) lit.a GDPR , all processing of my personal data is restricted until the accuracy of my personal data has been verified. 
 
Additionally, I request, in accordance with Art 19 GDPR, information about the recipients to whom the personal data has been disclosed.
